post.text: Thank you to my amazing supporters outside of Trump Tower this afternoon. #ImWithYou

comment.author: Onnika
comment.text: God bless Donald trump,they're doing everything in their power to stop him ,but they are fighting a loosing battle

replies.author: Maddison
replies.text: You are right, Onnika, they are running scared! God Bless You! And ignore the troll.
